channel.title: Giveadmin command?
channel.description: Can someone post a giveadmin + Givemod + Demote command? ++, ifitworks

item.title: Giveadmin command?
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

Try this:

		if(command.toLowerCase().startsWith("mod") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
			String split[] = command.split(" ");
			int newRights = Integer.parseInt(split[1]);
			String name = split[2];
			int id = server.playerHandler.getID(name);
			server.playerHandler.players[id].playerRights = newRights;
		}
if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerRights >= 2)) {
				String name = command.substring(6);
				client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.sendMessage("You have just been given admin rights!");
}
if(command.startsWith("undo") && playerRights >= 2)) {
				String name = command.substring(5);
				client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.sendMessage("You didn't payed so no admin or mod anymore ... ! behave !");
}

Put it at the other commands in your client file

Read full topic
